data.comment: The match is underway at Estadio de Sao Luis.
Free kick for Rio Ave in their own half.
In the minute 3, Ball safe as Rio Ave is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Manuel Oliveira signals a Rio Ave throw-in in Farense's half.
Farense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 4, Farense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Farense.
Farense have a goal kick.
In the minute 5, It's a goal kick for the away team in Faro.
Free kick Rio Ave.
Rio Ave have been awarded a corner by Manuel Oliveira.
In the minute 8, Manuel Oliveira signals a free kick to Rio Ave in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Farense in the half of Rio Ave.
In the minute 12, Manuel Oliveira signals a free kick to Farense.
Can Farense capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Rio Ave's half?
Rio Ave needs to be cautious. Farense have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 16, Farense advance rapidly upfield but Manuel Oliveira blows for offside.
The match at Estadio de Sao Luis has been interrupted briefly for a check on Fabio Coentrao, who is down injured.
In Faro a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 18, Rio Ave are coming forward and Lucas Piazon gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Farense goal kick.
Rio Ave's Fabio Coentrao looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 18, Manuel Oliveira awards Farense a goal kick.
Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Carlos Mane.
Pele instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 22, Farense have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Rio Ave at Estadio de Sao Luis.
Can Rio Ave get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Farense's half?
In the minute 25, Free kick for Farense in the half of Rio Ave.
Filipe Augusto (Rio Ave) has received a first yellow card.
Goal kick for Rio Ave at Estadio de Sao Luis.
In the minute 27, Farense to take a throw-in in Rio Ave territory.
Corner awarded to Farense.
Important block from the Rio Ave defence as Cesar fires in a strike for Farense.
In the minute 30, Rio Ave awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Farense in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Rio Ave goal kick.
In the minute 32, Free kick Farense.
Manuel Oliveira awards the away team a throw-in.
At Estadio de Sao Luis, Ronan Jeronimo has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 33, Manuel Oliveira signals a free kick to Farense.
Ronan Jeronimo (Rio Ave) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Faro.
In the minute 36, In Faro, Ronan Jeronimo of Rio Ave is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Rio Ave's Filipe Augusto gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Farense defender.
Throw-in for Rio Ave in the half of Farense.
In the minute 36, Manuel Oliveira signals a free kick to Farense in their own half.
Manuel Oliveira signals a Farense throw-in in Rio Ave's half.
Throw-in for Rio Ave in their own half.
In the minute 40, Ronan Jeronimo (Rio Ave) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Lucas Piazon for Rio Ave is whistled offside.
In Faro a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 42, Claudio Falcao is booked for the home team.
Rio Ave to take a throw-in in Farense territory.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Rio Ave at Estadio de Sao Luis.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Faro.
Throw-in Farense.
In the minute 45, The first-half has come to a close in Faro.
The second-half is underway at Estadio de Sao Luis.
In the minute 46, Free kick for Farense in the half of Rio Ave.
The away team replace Ronan Jeronimo with Gelson Dala.
Toni Borevkovic (Rio Ave) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Manuel Oliveira signals a throw-in for Farense, close to Rio Ave's area.
In the minute 47, Attention is being given to Rio Aveâ€™s Fabio Coentrao and play has been suspended briefly.
It seems as if Fabio Coentrao is unable to continue. Pedro Amaral replaces him for the away team.
Manuel Oliveira signals a free kick to Farense.
In the minute 52, Ball safe as Rio Ave is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in high up the field for Farense in Faro.
Rio Ave awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 53, Free kick for Rio Ave in their own half.
Jonatan Lucca's header is off-target for Farense.
Rio Ave have a goal kick.
In the minute 55, Free kick in a good position for Farense!
Throw-in for Farense in the half of Rio Ave.
Brian Mansilla is replacing Alex Pinto for the home team.
In the minute 56, Farense make their second substitution with Madi Queta replacing Jonatan Lucca.
In Faro a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Manuel Oliveira awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 58, Can Farense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Rio Ave's half?
Corner awarded to Farense.
Farense surge into the attack at Estadio de Sao Luis but Brian Mansillaâ€™s header is off-target.
In the minute 59, Manuel Oliveira awards Rio Ave a goal kick.
Rio Ave are caught offside.
Throw-in for Farense in the half of Rio Ave.
In the minute 60, Goal kick for Rio Ave at Estadio de Sao Luis.
Ball goes out of play for a Farense goal kick.
Manuel Oliveira blows against Farense's Nikola Stojiljkovic for offside.
In the minute 62, Throw-in for Rio Ave in their own half.
Can Farense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Rio Ave's half?
Rio Ave awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 64, Fabricio Isidoro (Farense) gets a yellow card.
Ball safe as Rio Ave is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Farense to take a throw-in in Rio Ave territory.
In the minute 66, Free kick for Rio Ave in their own half.
Rio Ave push forward at Estadio de Sao Luis and Pedro Amaral gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Farense defence.
Throw-in for Rio Ave close to the penalty box.
In the minute 67, Throw-in for Farense at Estadio de Sao Luis.
Farense have been awarded a corner by Manuel Oliveira.
Cesar (Farense) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 69, Corner awarded to Farense.
Important block from the Rio Ave defence as Nikola Stojiljkovic fires in a strike for Farense.
Farense's Ryan Gauld misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 70, It's a goal kick for the away team in Faro.
Manuel Oliveira signals a free kick to Rio Ave in their own half.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Faro to check on Nelson Monte, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 73, Free kick for Rio Ave in their own half.
Manuel Oliveira signals a free kick to Rio Ave in their own half.
Manuel Oliveira signals a Farense throw-in in Rio Ave's half.
In the minute 75, Free kick Farense.
Nelson Monte is back on the pitch.
Carlos Mane (Rio Ave) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 76, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Farense.
Farense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Manuel Oliveira signals a free kick to Farense just outside Rio Ave's area.
In the minute 78, Tarantini is on a sub for Carlos Mane for Rio Ave.
Diego Lopes for Rio Ave has been booked by Manuel Oliveira and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 79, Pele (Rio Ave) gets a yellow card.
Brian Mansilla (Farense) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In Faro Farense attack through Brian Mansilla. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 80, Goal kick for Rio Ave at Estadio de Sao Luis.
Rio Ave awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Manuel Oliveira signals a free kick to Farense.
In the minute 81, The home team have replaced Nikola Stojiljkovic with Patrick. This is the third substitution made today by Sergio Vieira.
Bilel Aouacheria is replacing Claudio Falcao for the home team.
Manuel Oliveira signals a free kick to Rio Ave in their own half.
In the minute 83, Free kick for Rio Ave in the half of Farense.
Amine Oudrhiri (Farense) has received a first yellow card.
Free kick for Farense in their own half.
In the minute 84, Rio Ave's Pedro Amaral has been booked in Faro.
Farense have been awarded a corner by Manuel Oliveira.
Farense have been awarded a corner by Manuel Oliveira.
In the minute 86, Free kick Farense.
Farense to take a throw-in in Rio Ave territory.
Rio Ave awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 87, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Manuel Oliveira awards the away team a throw-in.
Rio Ave awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 89, Free kick for Farense in their own half.
Farense pushes forward through Ryan Gauld, whose finish on goal is saved.
In Faro a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Manuel Oliveira signals a free kick to Rio Ave in their own half.
At Estadio de Sao Luis the fourth official shows that 5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Ball safe as Farense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Rio Ave in the half of Farense.
Farense have a dangerous throw-in.
Manuel Oliveira signals a Rio Ave throw-in in Farense's half.
Brian Mansilla of Farense gets in a strike, but is off target.
Rio Ave have a goal kick.
Farense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Manuel Oliveira signals a free kick to Farense in their own half.
The match has come to a close in Faro. The final score is 0-1.
Rio Ave make their fourth substitution with Gabrielzinho replacing Diego Lopes.
